# Text To Speech

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/pytorch-1.8.2%2B-orange)

This is an Text To Speech toolbox, that is a part of [OpenVINOï¿½ Training Extensions](https://github.com/opencv/openvino_training_extensions).

## Get Started


## Models compression

This project allows making compression of the models by [NNCF](https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/nncf_pytorch) framework.
